name: || SCRATCH || A PLATFORMER ||
description:
Game made by tigertut - scratch.mit.edu/users/tigertut/

Play on Scratch:

Game on Scratch

Welcome to Scratch Platformer!

The Game is completely based on Scratch Design!

Totally 11 Levels!

->->HOW TO PLAY<-<-

Move = Arrow Keys - WAD - Mobile Controls

The skip button only shows if you tried to beat a level more than 10 times.

[SPECIAL BLOCKS]

Custom Block : Spike -- die (restart level)

Custom Block : Lava -- die (restart level)

change size by (20) -- changes player size by 20

change size by (-20) -- changes player size by -20

set size to (100) -- sets player size to 100 (normal size)

hide -- Lets Enemys don't see you

show -- Lets Enemys see you 

ALL LEVELS ARE 100% POSSIBLE!

->->EXTRA INFO<-<-

->->CREDITS<-<-

Music:

--Epic Cinematic Trailer - Chosic.com

--Powerful Trap - Chosic.com

Rest is by me!
